TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit CollectionBase extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public MustInherit Class CollectionBase Implements IList
public ref class CollectionBase abstract : System::Collections::IList
type CollectionBase = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 提供強式型別集合的 基底類別。

span.span: Provides the base class for a strongly typed collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A執行個體永遠是可修改。A instance is always modifiable. 請參閱這個類別的唯讀版本。See for a read-only version of this class. 營運是的項目數可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements the can hold. 當項目新增至，自動增加容量視需要透過重新配置。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required through reallocation. 藉由設定，您可以減少容量屬性明確。The capacity can be decreased by setting the property explicitly. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作類別，並會使用該實作來建立集合物件。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/collectionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/collectionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/collectionbase.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 公用靜態 ( Visual Basic 中) 的這種類型的成員都是安全執行緒。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 不保證任何執行個體成員是安全執行緒。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 此實作不提供同步處理 （安全執行緒） 包裝函式，但是在衍生的類別可以建立他們自己的同步處理的版本使用屬性。

span.span: This implementation does not provide a synchronized (thread safe) wrapper for a , but derived classes can create their own synchronized versions of the using the property.

threadsafe.span: 透過集合列舉是本質上並非安全執行緒的程序。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

span.para: 這個基底類別可簡化實作器建立的強類型的自訂集合。實作者會擴充這個基底類別，而不是建立自己的建議。
This base class is provided to make it easier for implementers to create a strongly typed custom collection. Implementers are encouraged to extend this base class instead of creating their own.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

protected: CollectionBase();

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，並將其初始容量設定為預設值。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the default initial capacity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是的項目數，可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 當項目新增至，自動增加容量的要求以重新配置內部陣列。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估計集合的大小，指定初始容量，就不需要執行數項調整大小作業新增項目時。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 這個建構函式是 o （1） 的作業。This constructor is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: protected CollectionBase (int capacity);
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 capacity) cil managed
Protected Sub New (capacity As Integer)
protected: CollectionBase(int capacity);
new System.Collections.CollectionBase : int -> System.Collections.CollectionBase

param.name: capacity
param.span: 新清單一開始能夠儲存的元素數目。

span.span: The number of elements that the new list can initially store.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，並將其容量設定為指定值。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified capacity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是的項目數，可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 當項目新增至，自動增加容量的要求以重新配置內部陣列。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估計集合的大小，指定初始容量，就不需要執行數項調整大小作業新增項目時。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 這個建構函式是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是`capacity`。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `capacity`.

MemberSignature.Value: public int Capacity { get; set; }
.property instance int32 Capacity
Public Property Capacity As Integer
public: property int Capacity { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Capacity : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 可包含的元素數目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of elements that the can contain.
The number of elements that the can contain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是的項目數，可以儲存。 is the number of elements that the can store. 是實際的項目數。 is the number of elements that are actually in the . 永遠是大於或等於。 is always greater than or equal to . 如果超過同時新增項目，自動增加容量將舊的項目複製並加入新項目之前，重新配置內部陣列。If exceeds while adding elements, the capacity is automatically increased by reallocating the internal array before copying the old elements and adding the new elements. 藉由設定，您可以減少容量屬性明確。The capacity can be decreased by setting the property explicitly. 當值是設定明確地內部陣列也已重新配置以符合指定的容量。When the value of is set explicitly, the internal array is also reallocated to accommodate the specified capacity. 擷取這個屬性的值是 o （1） 的作業;將屬性設定為 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是新的容量。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation; setting the property is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the new capacity.

span.span: is set to a value that is less than .

exception.span: 系統上沒有足夠的可用記憶體。

span.span: There is not enough memory available on the system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定為零。 is set to zero. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 若要執行自訂動作，之前或之後在清除集合，覆寫受保護或方法。To perform custom actions before or after the collection is cleared, override the protected or method.

summary.span: 傳回可逐一查看 執行個體的列舉值。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the instance.
An for the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [Visual Basic、 C#][Visual Basic, C#] C# 語言的 `foreach` 陳述式 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `for each`) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在這個位置上，呼叫會擲回例外狀況。At this position, calling throws an exception. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 或 。 returns the same object until either or is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果集合，也就是列舉值的結尾是否位於集合中的最後一個元素之後的階段和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於此位置，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果上次呼叫傳回`false`，則呼叫會擲回例外狀況。If the last call to returned `false`, calling throws an exception. 若要再次將 設定為集合的第一個元素，您可以在呼叫 之後，接著呼叫 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果變更集合，例如加入、 修改或刪除元素，列舉值會將永久失效，而且下次呼叫或是就會擲回。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 如果集合已修改之間並，傳回設定為，項目，即使已經無效列舉值。If the collection is modified between and , returns the element that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated. 列舉值對集合並沒有獨佔存取，因此列舉集合在本質上並非安全執行緒的程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 雖然方法不是預設的情況下，COM 用戶端看見繼承類別將它公開，並在 COM 用戶端可能會導致非預期的行為。While the method is not visible to COM clients by default, inheriting the class can expose it and can cause undesirable behavior in COM clients. 這個方法是 o （1） 作業。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作類別，並會使用該實作來建立集合物件。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/collectionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/collectionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/collectionbase.vb#1)]

summary.span: 當清除 執行個體的內容時，執行額外的自訂處理序。

span.span: Performs additional custom processes when clearing the contents of the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法的預設實作是由衍生類別中清除集合之前，執行某些動作覆寫。The default implementation of this method is intended to be overridden by a derived class to perform some action before the collection is cleared. 只有在所傳回的執行個體上叫用 On \* 方法屬性，但不是能在所傳回的執行個體屬性。The On\* methods are invoked only on the instance returned by the property, but not on the instance returned by the property. 如果此程序失敗，集合會還原回先前的狀態。If the process fails, the collection reverts back to its previous state. 這個方法的預設實作是 o （1） 作業。The default implementation of this method is an O(1) operation.

span.para: 這個方法可讓實作器定義必須刪除所有項目從基礎之前執行的處理序。藉由定義這個方法，實作者可以將功能加入繼承的方法而不需要覆寫所有其他方法。 之前叫用標準的清除行為，而標準清除行為之後叫用。例如，實作者可以免除從全域清除刪除的特定項目。

This method allows implementers to define processes that must be performed before deleting all the elements from the underlying . By defining this method, implementers can add functionality to inherited methods without having to override all other methods. is invoked before the standard Clear behavior, whereas is invoked after the standard Clear behavior. For example, implementers can exempt certain elements from deletion by a global Clear.

span.para: 這個方法可讓實作器定義必須刪除所有項目從基礎之後執行的處理序。藉由定義這個方法，實作者可以將功能加入繼承的方法而不需要覆寫所有其他方法。 之前叫用標準的清除行為，而標準清除行為之後叫用。

This method allows implementers to define processes that must be performed after deleting all the elements from the underlying . By defining this method, implementers can add functionality to inherited methods without having to override all other methods. is invoked before the standard Clear behavior, whereas is invoked after the standard Clear behavior.

[!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/collectionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/collectionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/collectionbase.vb#1)]

span.para: 這個方法可讓實作者定義的基礎時，插入項目之前必須先執行處理序。藉由定義這個方法，實作者可以將功能加入繼承的方法而不需要覆寫所有其他方法。 之前叫用標準的插入行為，而叫用標準的 「 插入 」 行為之後。例如，實作者可以限制哪些類型的物件可以插入至。 此方法之前呼叫。

This method allows implementers to define processes that must be performed before inserting the element into the underlying . By defining this method, implementers can add functionality to inherited methods without having to override all other methods. is invoked before the standard Insert behavior, whereas is invoked after the standard Insert behavior. For example, implementers can restrict which types of objects can be inserted into the . is called prior to this method.

span.span: Performs additional custom processes after inserting a new element into the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法的預設實作是由插入指定的項目後，執行某些動作的衍生類別覆寫。The default implementation of this method is intended to be overridden by a derived class to perform some action after the specified element is inserted. 只有在所傳回的執行個體上叫用 On \* 方法屬性，但不是能在所傳回的執行個體屬性。The On\* methods are invoked only on the instance returned by the property, but not on the instance returned by the property. 如果發生下列其中一項，集合會還原回先前的狀態：The collection reverts back to its previous state if one of the following occurs: - 此程序失敗。The process fails. - 這個方法會覆寫，會擲回例外狀況。This method is overridden to throw an exception. 這個方法的預設實作是 o （1） 作業。The default implementation of this method is an O(1) operation.

span.para: 這個方法可讓實作者定義的元素插入基礎後必須執行的處理序。藉由定義這個方法，實作者可以將功能加入繼承的方法而不需要覆寫所有其他方法。 之前叫用標準的插入行為，而叫用標準的 「 插入 」 行為之後。

This method allows implementers to define processes that must be performed after inserting the element into the underlying . By defining this method, implementers can add functionality to inherited methods without having to override all other methods. is invoked before the standard Insert behavior, whereas is invoked after the standard Insert behavior.

This method allows implementers to define processes that must be performed before removing the element from the underlying . By defining this method, implementers can add functionality to inherited methods without having to override all other methods. is invoked before the standard Remove behavior, whereas is invoked after the standard Remove behavior. For example, implementers can prevent removal of elements by always throwing an exception in . is called prior to this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在相鄰元素的集合中，例如清單，接在移除的元素之後的元素會向上移動以佔用空出的位置。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot. 如果集合具有索引，則移動之項目的索引也會更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 集合的項目若在概念上群組成 Bucket (例如雜湊資料表)，則不適用這項行為。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .

span.span: is less than zero.
-or- is equal to or greater than .

This method calls , , and .

MemberSignature.Value: bool System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized { get; }
.property instance bool System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized
ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean Implements ICollection.IsSynchronized
property bool System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示對 的存取是否同步 (安全執行緒)。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果對 的存取為同步 (安全執行緒)，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if access to the is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A執行個體不會同步處理。A instance is not synchronized. 在衍生的類別可以提供的同步處理的版本使用屬性。Derived classes can provide a synchronized version of the using the property. 透過集合列舉是本質上並非安全執行緒的程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉期間：The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration: [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/remarks.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/remarks.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/remarks.vb#2)] 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: object System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot { get; }
.property instance object System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot
ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object Implements ICollection.SyncRoot
property System::Object ^ System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得可用來同步存取 的物件。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

value.span: 可用來同步存取 的物件。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生的類別可以提供自己的同步處理的版本使用屬性。Derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the using the property. 同步處理的程式碼必須執行作業的中，不要直接依賴。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the of the , not directly on the . 如此可確保衍生自其他物件的集合可以正常運作，This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具體來說，它會維護適當的同步處理的其他執行緒可能同時修改物件。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. 透過集合列舉是本質上並非安全執行緒的程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉期間：The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration: [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/remarks.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/remarks.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/remarks.vb#2)] 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

returns.span: 已加入 的 索引。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已等於容量、 清單的容量加倍自動重新配置內部的陣列，並將現有的項目複製到新陣列，加入新項目之前。If already equals the capacity, the capacity of the list is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array and copying the existing elements to the new array before the new element is added. 如果小於比容量，這個方法是 o （1） 作業。If is less than the capacity, this method is an O(1) operation. 如果容量需要增加，以容納新的項目，這個方法會變成 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。If the capacity needs to be increased to accommodate the new element, this method becomes an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作類別，並會使用該實作來建立集合物件。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會執行線性搜尋;因此，這個方法是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 這個方法會判斷是否相等，藉由呼叫。This method determines equality by calling . 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，這個方法會使用集合的物件並上的方法`item`來判斷是否`item`存在。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the collection’s objects’ and methods on `item` to determine whether `item` exists. 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，藉由進行這項判斷並方法`item`參數集合中的物件。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the and methods of the `item` parameter on the objects in the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作類別，並會使用該實作來建立集合物件。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已等於容量、 清單的容量加倍會插入新項目之前，會自動重新配置內部陣列。If already equals the capacity, the capacity of the list is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted. 如果`index`等於，`value`新增至結尾。If `index` is equal to , `value` is added to the end of . 在連續項目的集合 (例如清單) 中，後面接著插入點的項目會向下移動以容納新項目。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element. 如果集合具有索引，則移動之項目的索引也會更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 集合的項目若在概念上群組成 Bucket (例如雜湊資料表)，則不適用這項行為。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作類別，並會使用該實作來建立集合物件。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. MemberSignature.Value: bool System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize { get; }
.property instance bool System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize
ReadOnly Property IsFixedSize As Boolean Implements IList.IsFixedSize
property bool System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出 是否有固定的大小。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the has a fixed size.

value.span: 如果 有固定大小，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the has a fixed size; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有固定大小的集合不允許在集合建立後新增或移除項目，但允許對現有項目進行修改。A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements. 具有固定大小集合是唯讀的集合只會防止新增和移除項目; 的包裝函式因此，如果變更基礎的集合，包括新增或移除項目，固定大小的集合會反映這些變更。A collection with a fixed size is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including the addition or removal of elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

.property instance bool System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly
ReadOnly Property IsReadOnly As Boolean Implements IList.IsReadOnly
property bool System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出 是否唯讀。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the is read-only.

value.span: 如果 是唯讀的則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the is read-only; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 唯讀的集合不允許在集合建立後增加、移除或修改項目。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 是唯讀的集合是可防止修改集合的包裝函式集合因此，如果基礎集合進行變更，唯讀的集合會反映這些變更。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不包含指定的物件，會維持不變。If the does not contain the specified object, the remains unchanged. 不會擲回例外狀況。No exception is thrown. 這個方法會執行線性搜尋;因此，這個方法是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 這個方法會判斷是否相等，藉由呼叫。This method determines equality by calling . 在相鄰元素的集合中，例如清單，接在移除的元素之後的元素會向上移動以佔用空出的位置。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot. 如果集合具有索引，則移動之項目的索引也會更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 集合的項目若在概念上群組成 Bucket (例如雜湊資料表)，則不適用這項行為。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作類別，並會使用該實作來建立集合物件。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects.
